language = "Arabic";

htm_lang_prefix = "ar";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other devices on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.
regid = "غير- تعاوني";

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

/: cFosSpeed context menu
/. means `Close cFosSpeed`




/: Right click on cFosSpeed -> Windows Settings -> Auto-arrange windows

/. @note Currently disabled

ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "Игнорирай грешките със SSL сертификатите (опасно)";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "Ако на cFos Outlook DAV е позволено да игнорира грешките със SSL сертификатите, може да се свърже със сървъри с несигурни (опасни) SSL сертификати, като например самостоятелно подписани сертификати. Разрешаването на тази опция нормално не се препоръчва, защото това би направило SSL връзката уязвима на атаки тип \"man-in-the-middle\" (човек по средата).";

// Virtual Wi-Fi +++ Translators get explanations at http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dd815243%28v=vs.85%29.aspx


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  cFos
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------


/ %1 = number of seconds, %2 = "late"/"early"

/ %1 = max. allowed time difference in minutes, %2 = current time difference in minutes

/ %1, %2 are Windows version, e.g. "Windows 95", "Windows XP"



/ Don't translate!
/ END SECTION: don't translate

/
/  cFos Setup

/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

#language 1028
#fallback 2052
#fallback1 1033
#charset 136

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Traditional Chinese";
language_local = "正體中文";
htm_lang_prefix = "zh-tw";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "忽略 SSL 憑證錯誤（不安全）";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "若允許 cFos Outlook DAV 忽略 SSL 憑證錯誤，就可以連線至使用不安全 SSL 憑證的伺服器（例如自簽憑證伺服器）。通常不建議您開啟此選項，因為這樣會造成 SSL 連線可能受到中間人攻擊的威脅。";
od_key_registered = "已註冊此金鑰，請重新啟動 Outlook 讓註冊生效。";

/. Label of menu entry, which enables and disables any uploads to PNET.

dlg_blk_legalinfo = "cFosWatch 與 %p 無法保護的情況：\n如果您同時安裝了 ISDN 卡與傳統類比數據機，\n這些裝置就還是可能撥打到需要被封鎖的昂貴電話號碼。\n如果這發生在沒有 %p 或撥號連線（例：有第三方程式\n透過自訂的方式建立語音或數據連線），就無法被\n%p 或 cFosWatch 偵測到。這種情況下，您必須\n直接拔掉數據機的插頭或關閉電源。目前也沒有辦法保護\n由未安裝　%p 或 cFosWatch 的電腦和傳統電話所撥出的\n連線。若您想要得到完整的保護，請直接向電信業者申請\n封鎖某些電話號碼，但這種服務可能也不是免費的。此外，\n我們無法為 %p 和/或 cFosWatch 的功能失效，或是作業系統\n與第三方軟體功能負責。若其他第三方軟體刻意停用或規避\n%p 和/或 cFosWatch 的功能時，恕本公司亦不承擔任何責任。\n\n本文也儲存在 %p 資料夾的 0190.TXT 文件中。\n";

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Czech";
language_local = "Čeština";
htm_lang_prefix = "cs";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other PCs on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

#language 1031
#fallback 1033
#charset 0

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Deutsch";
language_local = "Deutsch";
htm_lang_prefix = "de";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/  "%h" contains only htm_prefix.
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

outlook_caldav_desc = "%p";
ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "SSL-Zertifikatfehler ignorieren (unsicher)";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "Wird cFos Outlook DAV gestattet, SSL-Zertifikatfehler zu ignorieren, so kann das Programm SSL-Verbindungen zu Servern mit unischeren Zertifikaten aufnehmen, z.B. selbstsignierte Zertifikate. Die Aktivierung dieser Option wird normalerweise nicht empfohlen, da die SSL-Verbindung damit anfällig für Man-in-the-Middle-Angriffe ist.";
od_key_registered = "Registrierung der Lizenzdatei abgeschlossen. Bitte starten Sie Outlook neu, damit die Registrierung wirksam werden kann.";

/ phone number blocking dialog
dlg_blk_header = "0190er-Sperre";
dlg_blk_subheader = "Schützen Sie sich vor kostspieligen Dialern.";
dlg_blk_off = "&Deaktivieren";
dlg_blk_internet = "Nur für &Internetverbindugen";
dlg_blk_all = "Für &alle %p-Modems";
dlg_blk_block = "Zu sperrende Rufnummern";
dlg_blk_warn = "Zu warnende Rufnummern";
dlg_blk_add = "Hinzufügen";
dlg_blk_del = "Entfernen";
dlg_blk_prefix = "Amtskennzahl";
dlg_blk_ask_pref = "Eine Amtskennzahl wird nur benötigt, wenn die\n"
        "ISDN-Karte in Ihrem Computer eine Nebenstelle Ihrer\n"
        "Telefonanlage ist. Falls hingegen Ihre ISDN-Karte\n"
        "direkt mit dem NTBA Ihrer Telefongesellschaft\n"
        "verbunden ist,\n"
        "so darf hier keine Amtkennzahl angegeben werden.\n\n"
        "Möchten Sie die eingegebene Amtkennzahl\n"
        "beibehalten?";
dlg_blk_ras = "Alle DFÜ Verbindungen";
dlg_blk_doublechk = "Doppel-Check";
dlg_blk_doublechk_help = "Aktivieren Sie den 'Doppel-Check', wenn\n"
        "Sie die Rufnummern auch ohne Amtskennzahl\n"
        "prüfen möchten. Dies ist nur nötig, wenn\n"
        "die an Ihren Computer angeschlossenen Geräte\n"
        "DFÜ-Verbindungen teilweise mit und teilweise\n"
        "ohne Amtskennzahl herstellen.";
dlg_blk_legalinfo = "Wovor cFosWatch und %p nicht schützen können: Wenn Sie eine\n"
        "ISDN-Karte oder ein analoges Modem betriebsbereit installiert und eingeschaltet\n"
        "haben, besteht die Möglichkeit, daß über diese Endgeräte eine 0190er Rufnummer\n"
        "angwählt wird. Geschieht dies nicht über %p oder über eine DFÜ-Netz-Verbindung\n"
        "(z.B. dann, wenn die Software Dritter unter Nutzung eigener Routinen keine Daten-\n"
        "sondern eine Sprach- oder Datenverbindung aufbaut), kann die Rufnummer nicht von\n"
        "%p oder cFosWatch überprüft werden. In solchen Fällen muss man den Stecker ziehen\n"
        "bzw. das Modem ausschalten. Ebenfalls besteht natürlich kein Schutz für Anrufe von\n"
        "Telefonen oder anderen Computern, auf denen %p bzw. cFosWatch nicht installiert ist.\n"
        "Wer ganz sicher gehen will, kann bei der Deutschen Telekom seinen kompletten\n"
        "Hausanschluß für 0190er Nummern sperren lassen. Dieser Service ist allerdings\n"
        "gebührenpflichtig. Weiterhin wird keine Haftung dafür übernommen, daß die\n"
        "Schutzmechanismen von %p und/oder cFosWatch durch Programmfehler in %p bzw.\n"
        "cFosWatch bzw. im Betriebssystem oder in anderer Software zu 100 % Wirkung\n"
        "entfalten, da es prinzipiell Möglichkeiten gibt, auch Schutzprogramme wie cFosWatch\n"
        "zu umgehen und/oder zu deaktiveren.\n"
        "\n"
        "Dieser Text wird auch in die Datei 0190.TXT gespeichert in Ihrem %p-Verzeichnis.\n";

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Greek";
language_local = "Ελληνικα";
htm_lang_prefix = "el";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/  "%h" contains only htm_prefix.
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "Αγνόησε τα λάθη πιστοποιητικών SSL (Μη ασφαλές)";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "Αν επιτρέψετε στο cFos Outlook DAV να αγνοεί τα λάθη πιστοποιητικών SSL, θα μπορεί να συνδεθεί με διακομιστές που παρέχουν μη-ασφαλή πιστοποιητικά SSL, όπως για παράδειγμα κάποιο πιστοποιητικό που έχει χειροποίητη υπογραφή. Ενεργοποίηση αυτής της επιλογής δεν συνίσταται, επειδή καθιστά μία σύνδεση SSL ευάλωτη σε επιθέσεις από μεσολαβητές.";

/ %1 = number of seconds, %2 = "late"/"early"

/ %1 = max. allowed time difference in minutes, %2 = current time difference in minutes

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "American English";
language_local = "American English";
htm_lang_prefix = "en";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/  "%h" contains only htm_prefix.
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"
htm_prefix = "https://www.cfos.de/";
cfosspeed_feature_highlights_htm = "%url/cfosspeed/cfosspeed-feature-highlights.htm";

               "assigned to a slot, the packet's traffic is counted in that slot. "
               "Otherwise, if the packet belongs to a connection of a program name "
               "that has been assigned to a slot, the traffic is counted for that "
               "slot.  If that is also not the case, the traffic is counted in the "
               "slot where all other traffic is counted, if that is set.";

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Spanish";
language_local = "Castellano";
htm_lang_prefix = "es";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"

/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/. %1 = product name

        "la posibilidad, que por estos dispositivos un N° telefónico costoso sea marcado\n"
        "Si la marcación no sale por %p ó una conexión de acceso telefónico\n"
        "(por ejemplo cuando una software tercera usa rutinas propias conectando)\n"
        "el número no puede ser comprobado de %p o cFosWatch.\n"
        "En estos casos tiene que tirar el enchufe o apagar el modem.\n"
        "Por su puesto no hay protección contra llamadas de otros teléfonos o\n"
        "de otros ordenadores, en cuales %p o cFosWatch no es instalado.\n"
        "Si quiere alcanzar la seguridad máxima pregunte su proveedor de telecomunicación,\n"
        "si hay la posibilidad de barrear números telefónicos con prefijos especiales\n"
        "(por ejemplo 806 en España).\n"
        "Además no nos responsabilizamos de que los mecanismos de protección\n"
        "de %p y / o  cFosWatch funcionen al ciento por ciento. Esto puede resultar\n"
        "errores en los programas %p o cFosWatch, en los sistemas operativos o en otra software.\n"
        "De principio hay posibilidades de eludir o desactivar programas de protección como cFosWatch\n"
        "\n"
        "Este Texto esta guardado en el fichero 0190.TXT de su directorio de %p.\n";

#language 1036

#charset 0

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Français";
language_local = "Français";
htm_lang_prefix = "fr";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

Activer cette option n'est pas recommandée, car elle rend une connexion SSL vulnérable aux attaques de type man-in-the-middle.";

language = "Magyar";

htm_lang_prefix = "hu";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/
/  6link / broadband connect / pnet
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "Ignora errori certificato SSL (rischioso)";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "Se viene consentito a cFos Outlook DAV d'ignorare gli errori del certificato SSL, esso può connettersi a servers con certificati SSL non sicuri, per esempio certificati auto-firmati. L'attivazione di questa opzione è normalmente sconsigliata, perché rende una qualsiasi connessione SSL vulnerabile ad attacchi di tipo man-in-the-middle.";
od_key_registered = "La chiave è stata registrata. Si prega di riavviare Outlook per rendere effettiva la registrazione.";

slot_explain = "Se un pacchetto dati ha un protocollo noto ed esso è stato assegnato ad una porta, il traffico di tale pacchetto verrà conteggiato in tale porta. Diversamente, se il pacchetto appartiene ad una connessione con un nome di programma assegnato ad una porta, il traffico verrà conteggiato relativamente a quella porta. Se non fosse questo il caso, il traffico dati verrà conteggiato relativamente alla porta di cui verrà conteggiato il traffico rimanente, se impostato";
traffic_analysis_title = "Analisi in Tempo Reale del Traffico";
other_traffic = "Tutto l'altro traffico";

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language

/ **********************************************************************

language = "Japanese";
language_local = "日本語";
htm_lang_prefix = "ja";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

dlg_blk_legalinfo =

 "ISDNカードもしくはアナログ形式モデムをすでにインストールし\n"
 "スイッチを入れている場合には\n"
 "電話、Faxやモデムなどの最後のデバイスを介してダイアラーなどからの\n"
 "怪しい電話番号がダイヤルされた可能性があります。\n"
 "シフォスもしくは\n"
 "ダイヤルネットアップワークの接続に関することで何もなかった場合\n"
 "（他のメーカのソフトウエアが独自のルータを使用中に\n"
 "データではなく、言語もしくはデータ接続が構成する場合。）\n"
 "シフォスもしくはシフォス・ウオッチのものでない電話番号を\n"
 "チェックすることができません。\n"
 "その場合には電源コードを抜く必要があります。\n"
 "（モデムの電源を切る）同様に電話やシフォスこの場合では\n"
 "シフォス・ウオッチがインストールされていない他のPCには\n"
 "当然のことながら保護はありません。\n"
 "確実にかつ安全に進めようと思っている方は、\n"
 "ドイチェテレコムでダイアラーなどからの怪しいすべての電話番号の接続を\n"
 "停止してもらうことができます。\n"
 "しかしこのサービスを受けるには費用がかかります。\n"
 "さらにシフォス、シフォス・ウオッチの保護装置はシフォス、\n"
 "シフォス・ウオッチ上ないしドライーバシステム、他のソフトウエア上では\n"
 "100％の効果を発揮できないことにたいしては\n"
 "責任を負いかねます。原則的には、シフォス・ウオッチと同じ保護プログラムを\n"
 "回避やアクティブな状態を停止する可能性があるからです。\n"
 "\n"
 "このテキストはシフォス・リストにある0190.TXTのデータ上にも保存されます。\n";

   "インターネットへの多くの接続が仮にあったとしても、接続時間の状況を改善し、返答時間を短くします。"
   "%p・ファイヤーウォールはインターネットからのコンピュータウイルスによる攻撃を防ぎ、これらの脅威からPCを守ります。"
   "安全の基礎として%pのファイヤーウォールをご使用ください。"
   "バージョンアップしているファイヤーウォールには変換できませんが、初期段階では有効です。他のファイヤーウォールも使用して作業が行えます。";

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other devices on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.
regid = "협력 안함";

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

        "일부는 외부회선번호 없이 만들어낼 때만 필요합니다.";

        "cFosWatch와 %p가 보호할 수 없는 것은: 만약 ISDN 카드 또는 아날로그 모뎀을\n"
        "설치하고 작동시켰을 경우 이러한 장치들을 통해 유료서비스 번호와 같은 특정 전화번호가\n"
        "걸려질 가능성이 있습니다. 이것이 %p 또는 다이얼 업 네트 연결을 통해 이루어지지\n"
        "않는 경우 (예를들면 제 3자의 소프트웨어가 자체 루틴을 사용하면서 데이터가 아닌, 언어\n"
        "또는 데이터 연결을 구축할 경우), 전화번호는 %p 또는 cFosWatch에 의해 확인될\n"
        "수 없습니다. 이러한 경우들에는 전원 코드를 뽑거나 모뎀을 끄는 수 밖에 없습니다.\n"
        "마찬가지로 %p 나 cFosWatch가 설치되어 있지 않은 전화기나 다른 컴퓨터로 부터\n"
        "오는 전화는 보호되지 못합니다. 확실한 차단을 원하시면 통신회사를 전체 전화연결에서\n"
        "이러한 특정 전화번호 로의 연결을 막을 수 있습니다. 그러나 이 서비스에는 요금이\n"
        "부과됩니다. 또한 %p 또는 cFosWatch의 보호 매카니즘이 %p/cFosWatch\n"
        "또는 운영체계나 그외 기타 소프트웨어의 프로그램 에러로 인해 100% 까지 효과를\n"
        "발휘하지 못할 수도 있음에 대해서는 책임을 지지 않습니다. 이는 원칙적으로\n"
        "cFosWatch와 같은 보호 프로그램 역시 사용자가 피하거나 비활성화 시킬 수 있기\n"
        "때문입니다.\n"
        "\n"
        "다음 텍스트는 또한 %p 디렉토리 내의 0190.TXT 파일에 저장되어 있습니다.";

/ regular tips
totd1 = "%p 트래픽 쉐이핑은 귀하의 업로드 및 다운로드를 빠르게 해줍니다! "
        "연결 시간을 단축해 줄 뿐 아니라, 다수의 연결이 한 네트상에서 이루어 질 지라도 "
        "단시간 내에 응답이 이루어 질 수 있게 해줍니다.";
totd2 = "네트로 부터의 일반적인 공격 및 알려진 미비 부위에 있어서 "
        "%p 방화벽은 지켜줄 것입니다! %p 방화벽을 보안의 기초로서 사용하십시오. "
        "이 방화벽은 최신형 방화벽을 대치해주지는 못하나, "
        "보안을 위한 좋은 시작은 될 수 있습니다. 더구나 이 방화벽은 다른 방화벽들과 "
        "함께 사용가능합니다.";
totd3 = "%p를 이용하시면 윈도우 시스템 하에서 일반 드라이버를 사용하는 것 보다 "
        "세배까지 빠른 인터넷 접속이 가능합니다. "
        "%p의 하이스피드 로그인이 이를 가능하게 합니다!";

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other PCs on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.
regid = "Niet samenwerkend";

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other PCs on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other PCs on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.
regid = "Nie współdzielony";

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

/ Don't translate!
/ END SECTION: don't translate

#language 1046
#fallback 2070
#fallback1 1034
#fallback2 1033
#charset 0

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Português do Brasil";
language_local = "Português do Brasil";
htm_lang_prefix = "pt-br";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "Ignorar erros de certificados SSL (não seguro)";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "Se o cFos Outlook DAV ignorar erros de certificados SSL, ele poderá se conectar à servidores que usam certificados não seguros, por exemplo, certificados auto-assinados. Não é recomendável habilitar esta opção, pois torna uma conexão SSL vulnerável a ataques man-in-the-middle.";
od_key_registered = "Registrado com sucesso. Por favor, reinicie o Outlook para que o registro tenha efeito.";

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Romanian";
language_local = "Română";
htm_lang_prefix = "ro";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/

language = "Russian";
language_local = "Русский";
htm_lang_prefix = "ru";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "Игнорировать ошибки SSL сертификата (небезопасно)";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "Если игнорирование ошибок SSL сертификата разрешено, cFos Outlook DAV может подключаться к серверам с небезопасными SSL сертификатами (например, с самоподписанными сертификатами). Включение данной опции обычно не рекомендуется, поскольку в таком случае SSL-подключения становятся уязвимым к атакам типа man-in-the-middle.";
od_key_registered = "Ключ зарегистрирован. Пожалуйста, перезапустите Outlook, чтобы регистрация вступила в силу.";

               "Если же пакет относится к подключению программы, которое "
               "привязано к слоту – трафик будет учтён в этом слоте. "
               "В противном случае, трафик будет учтён в слоте, в котором "

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

net_talk_help = "вещать статистику приоритезации трафика по локальной сети";

net_talk_subheader = "Пожалуйста, укажите, следует ли включить функцию Net_Talk.";

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other PCs on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Thai";
language_local = "Thai";
htm_lang_prefix = "th";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "ถ้าหาก cFos Outlook DAV ได้รับอนุญาตให้เพิกเฉยต่อข้อผิดพลาดของเครื่องหมายรับรองความปลอดภัย SSL แล้ว โปรแกรมสามารถเชื่อมต่อกับเซิร์ฟเวอร์ที่อาจจะไม่ปลอดภัยได้ เช่น เซิร์ฟเวอร์ที่ใช้เครื่องหมายความปลอดภัยที่ไม่ได้การรับรอง โดยทั่วไปแล้วไม่แนะนำให้ใช้ตัวเลือกนี้เพราะอาจทำให้การเชื่อมต่อ SSL เสี่ยงต่อการโจมตีจากคนกลาง";

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language

language = "Turkish";

htm_lang_prefix = "tr";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

Normalde bu ayarı etkinleştirmeniz önerilmez, çünkü SSL bağlantısını saldırılara karşı savunmasız hale getirir (man-in-the-middle attacks).";

/ **********************************************************************

/  language

language = "Indonesian";

htm_lang_prefix = "id";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"

/
/  outlook caldav

/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ %1 = number of seconds, %2 = "late"/"early"

/ %1 = max. allowed time difference in minutes, %2 = current time difference in minutes

/ %1, %2 are Windows version, e.g. "Windows 95", "Windows XP"

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Vietnamese";
language_local = "Tiếng Việt";
htm_lang_prefix = "vi";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

ignore_ssl_cert_chk = "Bỏ qua lỗi chứng chỉ SSL (không an toàn)";
ignore_ssl_cert_desc = "Nếu cFos Outlook DAV được phép bỏ qua lỗi chứng chỉ SSL, nó có thể kết nối đến các máy chủ với giấy chứng nhận SSL không an toàn, ví dụ giấy chứng nhận tự ký. Kích hoạt tùy chọn này thường không được khuyến khích, bởi vì nó làm cho một kết nối SSL dễ bị tấn công can thiệp trung gian.";

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other devices on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.
regid = "не кооперативно";

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

/ **********************************************************************

/  language

language = "Farsi";
language_local = "Farsi";
htm_lang_prefix = "fa";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/
/  6link / broadband connect / pnet
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/
/  language

language = "Simplified Chinese";
language_local = "简体中文";
htm_lang_prefix = "zh-cn";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"

/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

        "的可能性。\n"
        "\n"
        "本文也保存到 %p 文件夹的 0190.TXT 文件中。\n";

/ explanation of 'regid': the Traffic Shaping mode should be selected as "not cooperative" if there are other PCs on the net, which don't have %p Traffic Shaping.

/ "Net Talk" means that %p exchanges traffic statistics with other instances of %p in the same subnet (ie. on the same router).

/ Ping Variance: cFos Speed allows and keeps statistics for variations in ping times. These variations are common in wireless (WLAN and/or UMTS) networks

/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"

/ Anything below that line shouldn't be translated.
/ Those are outdated strings. Just ignore them

/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  cFos
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------


/ %1 = number of seconds, %2 = "late"/"early"

/ %1 = max. allowed time difference in minutes, %2 = current time difference in minutes

/ %1, %2 are Windows version, e.g. "Windows 95", "Windows XP"



/ Don't translate!
/ END SECTION: don't translate

#language 2070
#fallback 1046
#fallback1 1034
#fallback2 1033
#charset 0

/ **********************************************************************
/
/  language
/
/ **********************************************************************

language = "Portuguese";
language_local = "Português (pt-PT)";
htm_lang_prefix = "pt";


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  URLs for *ALL* languages.  Since all languages fall back to English,
/  we don't need to translate the following section of strings.
/
/  "%url" contains htm_prefix + htm_lang_prefix, thus in english
/  i.e. "%url/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm" is expanded to
/  "http://www.cfos.de/" + "en" + "/traffic-shaping/traffic-shaping.htm"
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------

/ must end with a slash ('/') and is used to set value of "%url"


/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
/
/  outlook caldav
/
/ ----------------------------------------------------------------------
